ai-patthana22.17:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.17:1.1_0: It’s not easy for feeling to give rise to pleasant feeling; you should not give rise to pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana22.17:1.1_1: Not feeling arises dependent on pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana22.17:1.1_2: Neutonomous feeling doesn’t give rise to pleasant feeling,
ai-patthana22.17:2.1_0: Neutral feeling doesn’t associate with painful feeling ...
ai-patthana22.17:3.1_0: Neutral feeling doesn’t associate with painful feeling ...
ai-patthana22.17:5.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of pleasant feeling ...
ai-patthana22.17:6.1_0: don’t give a teaching for the sake of pain, or for the sake of pleasure and for the sake of pain.
ai-patthana22.17:7.1_0: or feeling conditioned by painful feeling,
